## Read file into R
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
housing = read_csv("Housing_price_in_Beijing.csv")
housing = as.data.frame(housing)
str(housing)

sum(is.na(housing))
housing = na.omit(housing)
sum(is.na(housing))

str(housing)

removed_cols = c("url")
housing_removed_url = housing[, -which(names(housing) %in% removed_cols)]
str(housing_url)

housing_2000 = sample_n(housing, 2000)
str(housing_2000)
housing_2000_removed_url = housing[, -which(names(housing_2000) %in% removed_cols)]
str(housing_2000_removed_url)
```
